query:
SELECT v.id, v.district_id
                FROM villages v
                WHERE v.district_id = $3
                  AND (v.name ILIKE $1
                       OR v.name ILIKE $2
                       OR v.name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%')
                ORDER BY
                    CASE
                        WHEN v.name ILIKE $1 THEN 1
                        WHEN v.name ILIKE $2 THEN 2
                        ELSE 3
                    END
                LIMIT 1
